name: Expected ClickUp Hierarchy Template
description: Template for validating ClickUp task creation

tasks.name: üéØ Setup Typeform data collection form
tasks.description: Create and configure customer onboarding form

taskAnatomy.input: Customer data fields requirements, branding guidelines
taskAnatomy.outcome: Typeform with all required fields configured and tested
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Create form in Typeform
2. Add all customer data fields
3. Apply branding
4. Test submission flow
5. Get shareable link
taskAnatomy.success: Form submissions capture all required data correctly

taskAnatomy.input: Typeform webhook URL, Zapier account access
taskAnatomy.outcome: Zapier workflow triggered on form submission
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Create new Zap
2. Select Typeform trigger
3. Connect Typeform account
4. Select specific form
5. Test trigger

tasks.name: üîó Integrate CRM API connection
tasks.description: Connect Zapier to CRM for account creation

taskAnatomy.input: CRM API credentials, API documentation, field mapping requirements
taskAnatomy.outcome: Zapier connected to CRM API with account creation action configured
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Add CRM action to Zap
2. Authenticate API connection
3. Map form fields to CRM fields
4. Configure account creation parameters
5. Test API call
taskAnatomy.success: Test creates account in CRM with correct data

taskAnatomy.input: Validation rules (email format, required fields, data types)
taskAnatomy.outcome: Validation filter in Zapier that blocks invalid submissions
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Add Filter step before CRM action
2. Configure email validation
3. Check required field presence
4. Validate data formats
5. Test with valid and invalid data
taskAnatomy.success: Invalid data stops workflow, valid data proceeds

tasks.name: üîç Add duplicate check mechanism
tasks.description: Check for existing customer by email

taskAnatomy.input: CRM search API endpoint, email field from form
taskAnatomy.outcome: Duplicate detection step that prevents duplicate account creation
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Add CRM lookup step
2. Search by email before create
3. Add conditional logic
4. Skip creation if exists
5. Test with existing email
taskAnatomy.success: Existing email prevents duplicate account creation

taskAnatomy.input: Email service API credentials, email templates, sequence timing
taskAnatomy.outcome: Welcome email sequence configured in Zapier
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Add email service action
2. Connect email service account
3. Configure email template
4. Set up sequence timing
5. Test email delivery
taskAnatomy.success: Test account receives welcome email series

taskAnatomy.input: Admin email addresses, error notification template
taskAnatomy.outcome: Error path in Zap that notifies admin of failures
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Add error handling path
2. Configure admin notification
3. Include error details
4. Test error scenarios
5. Verify notifications received

tasks.name: üß™ Test complete workflow end-to-end
tasks.description: Full system test with real data

taskAnatomy.input: Test customer data, access to all systems, test checklist
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Submit test form
2. Verify Zap triggers
3. Check CRM account created
4. Confirm welcome email sent
5. Test error scenarios
6. Verify notifications work
taskAnatomy.success: All test cases pass without manual intervention

taskAnatomy.input: Zapier analytics dashboard access, KPI definitions
taskAnatomy.outcome: Dashboard showing automation success rate and error metrics
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Enable Zap analytics
2. Configure success metrics
3. Set up error tracking
4. Create monitoring dashboard
5. Test metric collection

taskAnatomy.input: Workflow diagram, error scenarios, contact information
taskAnatomy.process:
1. Document workflow steps
2. Create troubleshooting guide
3. List common errors and fixes
4. Document maintenance procedures
5. Share with team
taskAnatomy.success: Team can maintain automation using documentation
